Nobody Sleeps in the Woods Tonight

2020 | 1h 49m | Horror

Addicted to technology, a group of teens attends a rehabilitation camp in the forest, but a sinister force there intends to take them offline forever.

Starring: Julia Wieniawa-Narkiewicz,Michał Lupa,Wiktoria Gąsiewska

Watch all you want.

Nobody Sleeps In The Woods Tonight | Official Trailer | Horror Brains

A group of technology-dependent teenagers goes to offline camp and faces a deadly danger lurking in the woods.

Nobody Sleeps In The Woods Tonight 2 | Trailer | Netflix

Sometimes it’s hard to say who the real monster is. Adrenalina camp might be over, but the real massacre in the woods is only about to start. More blood, more monsters, less sleep
